description: Lightweight and resilient WebSocket client for Go with automatic reconnection, production-ready backoff, subscription resumption, and heartbeat management.
rules: Provide automatic reconnection with configurable backoff (min, max, factor, type)
Apply persistent, production-ready backoff across all reconnection scenarios and reset after stable connections
Support subscription resumption and message queueing on reconnect
Implement heartbeat via ping/pong with configurable intervals and timeouts
Expose event callbacks for onConnected, onReconnecting, and onError
